__e: And even if he does, do you think his master plan's going to extend to anything more than sitting and eating peanuts in the dark?
I told you I could fit the entire bowl of peanuts in my mouth.
I know you are not about to take that peanut butter up into my bed.
Get on a plane, eat some peanuts, and go home.
You buy a bag of peanuts in this town, you get a song written about you.
No. I'm eating peanuts, and you can't stop me.
